mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE employee_name = #{employeeName} and employee_password = #{employeePassword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( employee_name, employee_password, employee_email, employee_fullname, employee_birth, employee_tel, employee_gender, employee_address, created_at ) VALUES ( #{employeeName}, #{employeePassword}, #{employeeEmail}, #{employeeFullname}, #{employeeBirth}, #{employeeTel}, #{employeeGender}, #{employeeAddress}, now() )
